comment: Casteism kabhi nahi hat paayega jab tak society may is jaise sapole pal rhay hai... Kisi chiz ko khatm ek side say nahi dono side say karna parta hai lekin itni budhhi in % walo ko kha "Gwaar Kay Gwaar reh gye"
amr:
# ::snt Casteism kabhi nahi hat paayega jab tak society may is jaise sapole pal rhay hai... Kisi chiz ko khatm ek side say nahi dono side say karna parta hai lekin itni budhhi in % walo ko kha "Gwaar Kay Gwaar reh gye"
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / and
            :op1 (p / political-movement
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Casteism")
                  :domain (p2 / person
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "Kabhi")))
            :op2 (p3 / political-movement
                  :name (n3 / name
                        :op1 "Jaise"
                        :op2 "Sapole")
                  :domain (p4 / person
                        :ARG0-of (w / work-01)))
            :op3 (p5 / political-movement
                  :name (n4 / name
                        :op1 "Hindi"
                        :op2 "movement_3 :name ( name_4 :op1 "))))

comment: Inke jaise gadhe iss desh mai hai na toh desh kuch bhala nahi hone waala, jaise harami rahenge iss desh and society mai hai toh desh ko barbaad karenge he karenge.
amr:
# ::snt Inke jaise gadhe iss desh mai hai na toh desh kuch bhala nahi hone waala, jaise harami rahenge iss desh and society mai hai toh desh ko barbaad karenge he karenge.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / and
            :op1 (d / desh
                  :mode expressive
                  :domain (p / person
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Inke"
                              :op2 "Jaise"
                              :op3 "G gadhe")))
            :op2 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (d2 / desh
                        :mode expressive
                        :domain p)
                  :op2 (s / society
                        :mode expressive
                        :domain p)))
      :snt2 (a3 / and
            :op1 (d3 / desh
                  :mode expressive
                  :domain p)
            :op2 (a4 / and
                  :op1 (d4 / desh
                        :mode expressive
                        :domain p)
                  :op2 (a5 / and
                        :op1 (w / want-01
                              :mode expressive
                              :ARG0 p
                              :ARG1 (w2 / work-of-art
                                    :name (n2 / name
                                          :op1 "Jaise"
                                          :op2 "Harami"
                                          :op3 "Rahenge")))
                        :op2 (w3 / want-01
                              :mode expressive
                              :ARG0 p
                              :ARG1 w2
                              :name (n3 / name
                                    :op1 "Barbaad"
                                    :op2 "Karenge"))))))
